      • callApi

        @Nullable
public <T,U,S> T callApi(@Nullable
                                    java.lang.String operationId,
                                    @NonNull
                                    GenericAdapter.Mapper<U,T> mapper,
                                    @NonNull
                                    CloudRequest<U,S> request,
                                    @Nullable
                                    java.lang.Object... requestParameters)
                             throws MbedCloudException
        Calls a Pelion Cloud API.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the model returned in the list
        S - service to call
        U - type of objects returned by the API
        Parameters:
        operationId - name of the API called.
        mapper - mapper between the response from Pelion Cloud and the expected model/entity.
        request - request definition.
        requestParameters - parameters.
        Returns:
        response returned by Pelion.
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if an error occurred during the call.

      • callApi

        @Nullable
public <T,U> T callApi(@Nullable
                                  java.lang.String operationId,
                                  @NonNull
                                  GenericAdapter.Mapper<U,T> mapper,
                                  @NonNull
                                  CloudRequest.CloudCall<U> call)
                           throws MbedCloudException
        Calls a Pelion Cloud API.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the model returned in the list
        U - type of objects returned by the API
        Parameters:
        operationId - name of the API called.
        mapper - mapper between the response from Pelion Cloud and the expected model/entity.
        call - low level call definition.
        Returns:
        response returned by Pelion.
        Throws:
        MbedCloudException - if an error occurred during the call.
